cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: lit. mole cricket and ants, fig. tiny individuals with no power

exm.mng: fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China
like ants pursuing a stink (idiom); the mob chases the rich and powerful, the crowd runs after trash

exm.mng: (like) a cat on a hot tin roof, anxious, agitated

exm.mng: "ant tribe", college graduates who endure cramped living conditions while trying to develop a career
